channel.title: Sam Watson on LocalStack
channel.description: Recent content in Sam Watson on LocalStack

item.title: Develop and Test Real-time Data Pipelines with LocalStack
item.description: At LocalStack, we rely on AWS Lambda as a key part of our serverless infrastructure toolkit. As with any critical service, we want to extract analytics event data from running Lambda functions and aggregate it in our data warehouse so that we can track user stories and squash bugs. But this presents a challenge: how can we emit detailed analytics data while keeping Lambda code simple and performant?
